items.sentence: Tom's parents didn't approve of his lifestyle.
Tom went to the train station to see Mary off.
You seem to shoot as well as your father does.
I'm sure that Tom had nothing to do with that.
What have you ladies been doing all afternoon?
Every weekend, Tom goes to his parents' house.
Tom says that he doesn't remember that at all.
Tom said that he wanted to buy a blue sweater.
Tom, why don't you pop in for a drink tonight?
Tom complained that the heater wasn't working.
Tom tries to avoid conflict whenever possible.
Tom lives near the hospital where he was born.
If everything's fine, then why are you crying?
It'd be best if we started again from scratch.
You don't have to get a PhD to get a good job.
Why didn't you come if you knew I needed help?
Tom deserves everything that's coming his way.
I wouldn't have done it without Tom's consent.
Tom forgot to put the milk back in the fridge.
Did last night's earthquake cause much damage?
